MAYONNAISE, SOYFREE VEGENAISE VEGAN MAYO GAL

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Place vegan mayonnaise in a squeeze bottle. Store at below 41°F or below until ready for service.

2. Reheat Boca patty in steamer, set at 210°F for 6 minutes to internal 
temperature of 165°F. Hold in hot well at 135°F or above until needed.

1. Ensure impinger is turned on to 500°F and belt time is set to 1 
minute, 20 seconds.

2. Cut 1 torpedo in half lengthwise, leaving one side still attached.

3. Squeeze 2 tbsp vegan mayonnaise on the bottom side of the torpedo 
roll.

4. Place a prepared Boca patty on top of mayonnaise on bread.

5. Place sandwich on screen and toast for 1 minute, 20 seconds.

6. Remove from impinger and place 5 cucumber slices on top of patty.

7. Sprinkle 3 tbsp roasted kale over cucumbers.

8. Evenly distribute 2 tbsp shredded carrots over kale.

9. Top kale with 2 tbsp shredded radish.

10. Squeeze 1/2 tbsp red wine vinaigrette dressing over top of carrots 
and radishes.

11. Squeeze 2 tbsp (1 oz) Louie Sauce evenly over all ingredients.

12. Wrap sandwich and serve immediately.
